name: RightClickItem
description: This event is fired on both sides before the player triggers Item.onItemRightClick(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack, net.minecraft.world.World, net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer, net.minecraft.util.EnumHand) . Note that this is NOT fired if the player is targeting a block. For that case, see PlayerInteractEvent.RightClickBlock . Canceling the event clientside causes processing to continue to the other hands, while canceling serverside will simply do no further processing.
